alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 19 at 2:34PM EST until January 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.0 to 13.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...This splashover and very minor coastal flooding will mainly be confined to the north and east facing coastlines of Cape Cod and the north side of Nantucket. Splashover and very minor coastal flooding of lots, parks, and roads within a few hours on either side of high tide can be expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
